info.author: Paul Harrison
info.description:
This is a package for calculation of Levy stable distributions
(probability density function and cumulative density function) and for
fitting these distributions to data.

It operates by interpolating values from a table, as direct computation 
of these distributions requires a lengthy numerical integration. This 
interpolation scheme allows fast fitting of Levy stable distributions 
to data using the Maximum Likelihood technique.

Does not support alpha values less than 0.5.
info.name: PyLevy
info.summary: A package for calculating and fitting Levy stable distributions.
info.html_description:
This is a package for calculation of Levy stable distributions (probability density function and cumulative density function) and for fitting these distributions to data.

It operates by interpolating values from a table, as direct computation of these distributions requires a lengthy numerical integration. This interpolation scheme allows fast fitting of Levy stable distributions to data using the Maximum Likelihood technique.

Does not support alpha values less than 0.5.
